    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Živa bitja - milijonar</string>
            <string language="en">Living organisms - millionaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebende organismen - Millionaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matière organique - millionnaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Organismos vivos - millionaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Organismi viventi - millionaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οργανισμοί διαβίωσης - εκατομμυριούχος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Organismos vivos - millonario</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Zabavna naloga - splošno znanje o živih bitjih.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation in form suitable to play game Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? with a main topic - living organisms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">rastlina</string>
            <string language="en">plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">žival</string>
            <string language="en">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">game</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung in der Form verwendbar für 
Spielspiel, wer ein Millionaire sein möchte? mit einem 
Hauptthema - lebende organismen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation sous la forme appropriée au jeu de 
jeu qui veut être un millionnaire ? avec un sujet principal - 
organizations de vie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação no formulário apropriado ao jogo 
do jogo quem quer ser um millionaire? com um tópico principal -
organismos vivendo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione nella forma adatta al gioco del 
gioco chi desidera essere un millionaire? con un soggetto 
principale - organismi viventi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση με μορφή κατάλληλη να παίξει το παιχνίδι 
ποιος θέλει να είναι εκατομμυριούχος; με ένα βασικό θέμα -
οργανισμοί διαβίωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Presentación en la forma conveniente al juego 
del juego quién desea ser un millonario? con un asunto 
principal - organismos que viven.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrieb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
